description: Compare Old French menagerie, mesnagerie. See manage and compare menagerie.

entries.meaning: Management; manner of using; conduct; direction.
examples: Show thy art in honesty, and lose not thy virtue by the bad managery of it.
But they found  [因 , to their cost, that their unreasonable managery in that particular drew upon them an expence of many millions  [因
[因  if a Man has several Manageries upon his Hands, and the Books and Papers of them lie together, Confusion is apt to grow, not only among them but, in his Head  [因
